question: with regard to question no 3195. I would also like to know that is it a false allegation on deobandis that they beleive that prophet Muhammed (saw) is alive in his grave? jazakallah
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is the belief of the Ahlus sunnah (followers of Rasulullah) Wal Jamaa (and followers of the Sahaaba) that Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) is alive in his grave.

Deobandis subscribe to the beliefs of the Ahlus sunnah Wal Jamaa.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
